G.T.5860
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 2nd OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
North of CAMBRAI some progress has been made towards RAMILLIES.
The enemy are withdrawing in the LA BASSEE area, and it is reported we have occupied LA BASSEE and AUBERS.
0n the YPRES Battle Front we have made progress South of GHELUWE and have crossed the GHELUWE - WERVICQ Road North of REEKE to South of GHELUWE.
The French have made progress South of HANDZAEME.
French Front.
Nothing to report.
2. ITALIAN, MACEDONIAN & PALESTINE FRONTS.
Nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
Issued at 6.20 p.m.
2nd October, 1918.
